metadata.reference: UI Components, Performance, Accessibility, Edge Cases

test_cases.name: Arrow keys navigate rows
test_cases.input: Press Up/Down arrows in patient table

test_cases.name: Escape closes drawer
test_cases.expected: Drawer closes, focus returns to table

test_cases.name: No keyboard traps
test_cases.expected: Can always escape focus with Tab/Shift+Tab

test_cases.name: Shortcuts disabled in input
test_cases.input: Press 'A' while typing in text field

test_cases.name: Initial load spinner
test_cases.expected: Shows loading spinner while fetching data

test_cases.name: Button loading state
test_cases.expected: Button shows spinner, disabled during action

test_cases.name: Drawer data loading
test_cases.expected: Content areas show loading until data arrives

test_cases.name: No patients message
test_cases.expected: Shows 'No patients to review' with illustration

test_cases.name: Empty RX claims tab
test_cases.expected: Shows 'No RX claims found for this patient'

test_cases.name: Recover from error
test_cases.expected: Page reloads, error cleared if transient

test_cases.name: Error toast
test_cases.expected: Red toast: 'Failed to save. Please try again.'

test_cases.name: Drawer side panel
test_cases.expected: Drawer as side panel, table visible

test_cases.name: Affects all tables
test_cases.expected: Claims table also uses new density

test_cases.name: Column selector opens
test_cases.expected: Dropdown shows all columns with checkboxes

test_cases.name: Minimum 1 column
test_cases.expected: Prevents hiding last column, shows warning

test_cases.name: Expand row
test_cases.expected: Row expands to show additional details

test_cases.name: Collapse row
test_cases.expected: Row collapses back to single row

test_cases.name: Validation in inline edit
test_cases.expected: Red border, error message, save prevented

test_cases.name: Deselect all
test_cases.input: Click header checkbox when all selected

test_cases.name: Bulk deny
test_cases.expected: Bulk deny dialog with reason field

test_cases.name: Export to CSV
test_cases.expected: CSV file downloads with current data

test_cases.name: Export all columns
test_cases.expected: Option to include all columns or visible only

test_cases.name: Print patient summary
test_cases.expected: Print dialog opens with formatted summary

test_cases.name: Print-friendly layout
test_cases.expected: No navigation, clean layout for printing

test_cases.name: Protocol cache hit
test_cases.expected: Second request uses cache, no API call

test_cases.name: Table announced
test_cases.input: Navigate to table with screen reader

test_cases.name: Column headers read
test_cases.expected: Column header announced for each cell

test_cases.name: Skip to content link
test_cases.expected: Skip to main content link visible

test_cases.name: No focus loss
test_cases.expected: Focus moves to next logical element

test_cases.name: Conflict resolution
test_cases.input: Same record changed offline and online

test_cases.name: Required field validation
test_cases.input: Submit form with empty required field

test_cases.name: Date range validation
test_cases.expected: Shows 'End date must be after start' error

test_cases.name: Real-time validation
test_cases.expected: Errors shown as user types after blur

test_cases.name: SQL injection prevention
test_cases.input: Enter '; DROP TABLE patients; --' in search
test_cases.expected: Treated as literal text, no SQL execution

test_cases.name: Timezone display
test_cases.expected: Dates shown in user's local timezone

test_cases.name: Real-time updates
test_cases.input: User A changes patient, User B viewing
test_cases.expected: User B sees update in real-time

test_cases.name: Patient lock indicator
test_cases.input: User A opens patient for edit
test_cases.expected: User B sees 'Being edited by User A'

test_cases.name: Lock timeout
test_cases.expected: Lock released, other users can edit

test_cases.name: Request queuing
test_cases.expected: Requests queued, not all fired simultaneously

test_cases.name: Debounced search
test_cases.expected: Only final value triggers API call

test_cases.name: Upload cancellation
test_cases.expected: Upload cancelled, partial file cleaned up

test_cases.name: Network failure during upload
test_cases.expected: Error shown, resume option if supported

test_cases.name: Cross-field validation
test_cases.expected: Validation error: 'Start must be before end'

test_cases.name: Notes autosaved
test_cases.input: Type in notes field, wait 5 seconds

test_cases.name: Manual save still works
test_cases.expected: Immediate save regardless of autosave timer

test_cases.name: Copy patient MRN
test_cases.input: Click copy icon next to MRN

test_cases.name: Copy fails gracefully
test_cases.expected: Shows 'Unable to copy' with manual select option

test_cases.name: Help button opens guide
test_cases.expected: Help panel opens with relevant content
